title: 44. Hire Out Your Weaknesses: Create A Successful Website as an Esthetician With Shelley Hancock + Beverlee Garb
description:
Hi treatment Roomies, 

Welcome to our episode on online esthetician sucess with Shelley Hancock and Beverley Garb. Xoxo, Tess & Lo

Looking for a beautiful, affordable website?

Get $50 off your new esthetics website with CODE: WEB20

We highly recommend Beverlee Garb at www.estheticianwebsites.com

They specialize in designing websites for estheticians.

Reputable, easy to work with, 30+ years in the skincare industry.


Lauren's Instagram: @laurens.esthetics + Lauren's Blog www.lauren-kruger.com

Tess' Instagram @myestytessa.dermaplus

Tess' TikTok @myestytessa.dermaplus

Tess' YouTube: Tess Zolly

Shop Shelley's retail, equipment, books and find more resources for estheticians!

https://www.shelleyhancock.com

Website Design for Estheticians

Beverlee's contact: info@beverleegarb.com

https://www.estheticianwebsites.com/learn-more

IG: @shelley.hancock

Music by LiQwYd

--- Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/the-treatment-room/support
